mapper.select: select * FROM standing_book where pay_time is null and (datediff(end, now()) between 0 and 60)
select * FROM standing_book where pay_time is null and (datediff(end, now()) < 0)

SELECT c.* FROM (SELECT * from (SELECT CODE, MAX(CONTRACT_END) CONTRACT_END FROM standing_book GROUP BY CODE) a WHERE DATEDIFF(a.CONTRACT_END, NOW()) < 60) b LEFT JOIN standing_book c on c.CODE = b.CODE AND c.CONTRACT_END = b.CONTRACT_END
SELECT CODE, MAX(SITE_NAME) siteName, SUM(RENT) rent, SUM(TAX) tax FROM standing_book GROUP BY CODE
SELECT year, SUM(rent) rent, SUM(tax) tax FROM (SELECT rent, tax, YEAR(PAY_TIME) year FROM standing_book WHERE PAY_TIME is not null) a GROUP BY year
